h3cUnicast.name: h3cUnicast

revisions.description: Revisions made by Hangzhou MIB team.

h3cUnicast.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou Institute Huawei-3Com Tech, Inc.
h3cUnicast.description: This MIB is a framework MIB for unicast related features.

h3cURPFTable.name: h3cURPFTable
h3cURPFTable.description: Unicast Reverse Path Forwarding (URPF) is used to prevent the network attacks caused by source address spoofing. This table is used to configure URPF on specific interfaces.

h3cURPFEntry.name: h3cURPFEntry
h3cURPFEntry.description: The entry of h3cURPFTable, indexed by vlan interface index.

h3cURPFEnabled.name: h3cURPFEnabled
h3cURPFEnabled.description: This object is used to enable or disable URPF on certain vlan interfaces.

h3cURPFSlotID.name: h3cURPFSlotID
h3cURPFSlotID.description: This object specifies to which slot packets are redirected in order to perform URPF check.

h3cURPFTotalReceivedPacket.name: h3cURPFTotalReceivedPacket
h3cURPFTotalReceivedPacket.description: This object provides total received packets number.

h3cURPFDroppedPacket.name: h3cURPFDroppedPacket
h3cURPFDroppedPacket.description: This object provides total dropped invalid packets number.

h3cURPFClearStat.name: h3cURPFClearStat
h3cURPFClearStat.description: This object is used to clear the URPF statistics on certain vlan interfaces. This object is actually a write-only object. When read, it always returns 0. When set to 1, the objects h3cURPFTotalReceivedPacket and h3cURPFDroppedPacket are reset to 0.
